document.full_text: samsung electronics co ltd, the world's no.2 handset manufacturer, plans to roll out a new version of its flagship smartphone galaxy s in south korea this month through kt corp, the telecommunications operator said on friday.
document.title: samsung to launch galaxy s sequel in south korea in late april
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics co ltd, the world's no.2 handset manufacturer, plans to roll out a new version of its flagship smartphone galaxy s in south korea this month through kt corp, the telecommunications operator said on friday.
